metadata.title: TweeOnline | Professional Websites for Small Business
metadata.description: No hassle, just results. Professional websites for entrepreneurs who want to grow. €1499 one-time + €49/month.

hero.title: Your website,
hero.subtitle: Professional websites for entrepreneurs who want to grow. Findable, secure and fully managed.

mission.title: No hassle, just results
mission.description: As an entrepreneur, you have better things to do than worry about your website. We handle everything: from design to hosting, from SEO to security. You focus on your customers, we focus on your online visibility.

professional.title: Professionalism
professional.description: A website that builds trust. Modern design, fast loading times and perfectly functional on every device.

findable.title: Findability
findable.description: Be found on Google. SEO-optimized, locally visible and ready for your target audience.

secure.title: Security
secure.description: SSL certificate, daily backups and continuous monitoring. Your data is safe with us.

pricing.title: Transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: No surprises, no fine print
pricing.paymentPlan: Prefer to pay in installments? That's possible too.

workflow.title: How does it work?
workflow.subtitle: From first contact to live in 5 steps

chat.title: Intake
chat.description: Tell us about your business through our smart intake chat. We ask the right questions.

plan.title: Plan
plan.description: You receive a detailed proposal with design concepts and a clear timeline.

build.title: Build
build.description: We build your website with attention to every detail. You get regular updates.

live.title: Live
live.description: After your approval, your website goes live. We handle everything: domain, hosting, SSL.

service.title: Service
service.description: We manage your website. Updates, backups, security - you don't have to think about anything.

ownership.title: 100% ownership
ownership.description: The website is yours. All code, all content, everything.

response.title: 24-hour response time
response.description: On business days we respond to your questions within 24 hours.

simple.title: No complex jargon
simple.description: We speak in plain language, no technical mumbo jumbo.

chat.title: Start your intake
chat.welcome: Hello! I'm the virtual assistant of TweeOnline. I'm here to help you create a plan for your new website. Let's begin: what is the name of your business?

complete.title: Thank you!
complete.description: We have received all the information. You will receive a personal proposal at your email address within 24 hours.
